rukus.text: 36|13|chaur anak( mou ham meat) leuk uteahar brab puokke ampi  rueng robsa anak phoumisrok muoy nowpel del banda anakneasar ban  towdl puokke .

36|14|nowpel del yeung ban banhchoun anakneasar pir neak towkean  puokke( anak phoumisrok)  pelnoh puokke ban bdeseth nung ke teang  pir . banteabmk  yeung ban pongrung( ke teangpir) nung anakneasar tibei  tiet .  haey puokke ban pol tha  pitabrakd nasa  puok yeung ku  chea anakneasar del trauv ke banhchoun mokkan puok anak .

36|15|puokke( anak phoumisrok) ban niyeay tha  puok anak kreante  chea mnoussa thommotea dauch puok yeung bonnaoh  haey mcheasa da mha sabborsa  ka minban banhchouh avei der .  tampit puok anak kuchea puokphout kohk .
36|16|puokkeat ban tb vinh tha  mcheasa robsa puok yeung doeng tha pit  brakd nasa puok yeung  kuchea anakneasar del trauv ke banhchoun mokkan  puok anak .
36|17|haey katapvokechch robsa puok yeung ku kmeanoavei krawpi kar phsaapv  phsaay sar yeang chbasaleasa noh laey .

36|18|puokke ban niyeay tha  pitabrakd nasa  puok yeung mean  braphnaul akrak daoysaarte puok anak .  brasenbae puok anak pitchea min  prom b pea  chh b( kar phsaapvophsaeay sar) te noh  yeung brakadchea nung kb  puok anak nung dom thm  haey puok anak nung ttuolorng tearounakamm da chhucheab pi  puok yeung cheaminkhan .

36|19|puokkeat ban tb vinh tha  braphnaul akrak robsa puok anak ku now  cheamuoynung puok anak .  tae( vea chea braphnaul akrak ryy)  brasenbae puok anak  trauv ban ke kraenromluk noh? phtoytowvinh  puok anak kuchea krom del  bampean .
36|20|haey mean borsa mneak mk pi cheayokrong ban mokadl teang  branhab branhal daoy ke ban niyeay tha  ao krom robsakhnhom.  chaur puok  anak anouvotd tam anakneasar teangnoh choh .
36|21|chaur puok anak anouvotd tam anak del min teamtear kamrei pi puok  anak choh  piproh puokke chea anak ttuol ban kar changaoulobangheanh(pi  a l laoh) .
36|22|tae hetoaveibeanchea khnhom min korp sakkar champoh anak del ban  bangkeut khnhom  khn del puok anak nung trauv vilotralb tow champoh trong noh

36|23|tae aoy khnhom yk mcheasa phe  sa ng  mk korp sakkar krawpi trong ryy?  brasenbae mcheasa mha sabborsa mean bamnng aoy khnhom mean krohthnak  ku kar  a nd reak m  robsa puokvea min ach karpar avei dl khnhom  ning min ach sangkroh  khnhom ban laey .
36|24|pitabrakd nasa  bae dauchnaoh men  khnhom pitchea sthet knong pheap  v nge  v ng da chbasaleasa .
36|25|pitabrakd nasa  khnhom mean chomnue leu mcheasa robsa puok anak .  dau che  neah  chaur anak sdab khnhom .
36|26|( banteabpi borsa noh trauv ban samleab) mean ke( mea la ai- kat) pol tha  chaur anak chaul thansuokr choh .  ke ban tb vinh tha  khnhom chng  te aoy krom robsakhnhom doeng
36|27|nouv avei del mcheasa robsakhnhom ban aphytosa aoy khnhom  ning ban thveu aoy  khnhom sthet knongchamnaom anak del ttuol ban ke tde y sa khpangkhpasa
36|28|haey yeung minban banhchouh kangtp pi leumekh towleu krom  robsa ke banteabpi ke laey  haey yeung ka minmen chea anak del banhchouh der .
36|29|kar vineasa robsa puokke  kmeanoavei krawpi samrek muoy yeang  khlang noh te  haey pelnoh puokke ka slab kmean sal laey .
36|30|kuor aoy sday bamphot champoh mnoussa lok.  kmean anakneasar  na mneak mokadl puokke krawpi puokke ban chamakalakleuy nungke  laey .
36|31|tae puokke( areab mea kkah) mindoeng teryy  bonman chomnean mk  haey del yeung ban bamphlanh moun puokke?  pitabrakd nasa puokke ( anak chomnean moun) min ach vilotralb tow rk puokke ban laey .
36|32|haey real puokke  nung trauv ke bramoul mokkan yeung teangoasaknea .
